title: ESA Council decisions set the stage for more diverse  European launch services
Ariane 6: Europe’s next big rocket in a nutshell
summary: Ariane 6 is the newest rocket in a series that has, for five decades, been launching Europe towards the stars. Building on all the knowledge, expertise and technology developed over the years, Ariane 6 will be versatile, modular, and European.

title: ILR-33 Amber 2K Makes History as Poland’s First Rocket to Reach Space
summary: The Łukasiewicz Institute of Aviation has made history with the launch of its ILR-33 Amber 2K rocket from the Andøya Space Centre in Norway. The ILR-33 Amber 2k rocket was launched on its first space shot on 3 July from the Norwegian launch facility. Powered by a hybrid core stage and two solid-fuel boosters, the […]
